extension.name: i18n Mage
config.general.title: General
config.syncBasedOnReferredEntries.desc: When syncing, use the reference language file as baseline; otherwise use all language files
config.projectPath.title: Project Root Path
config.translateServices.title: Translation Services
config.langAliasCustomMappings.desc: Custom language alias mapping (format: { 'language_code': ['alias1', 'alias2'] }), where language codes follow Google Translate's country/region code standard
config.translationHints.title: Inline Translation Hints
config.translateHintsEnableLooseKeyMatch: Enable fuzzy match for dynamic keys (e.g. t(`prefix.${key}.suffix`)). If multiple results match, only the first is shown
config.workspace.title: Workspace-only Configuration
config.sorting.writeCode: Sorting Rule for Language Files (flat structure only)
config.sorting.exportMode: Sorting Rule When Exporting to Excel
config.i18nFeatures.title: I18n Features
config.defaultNamespace.desc: Default namespace for frameworks like react-i18next. Used if no namespace is provided in t() calls.
config.matchExistingKey.desc: On fix, missing keys are matched to existing entries in the reference language. If found, text is replaced with that key (priority over auto-translation)
config.autoTranslateMissingKey.desc: On fix, for undefined translation texts, the translation service is invoked to generate new entries and update the files
config.stopWords.desc: Stop words excluded from auto-generated keys
config.maxGeneratedKeyLength.desc: Max length for generated keys. If exceeded, naming is optimized automatically
config.keyPrefix.desc: Prefix for generated keys: none, manual selection or most common
config.writeRules.title: Write Rules
config.languageFileIndent.desc: Spaces for indentation when writing files. If unset, inferred from existing files
config.quoteStyle.auto: Detect and use common quote style
config.validateLanguageBeforeTranslate.d: Validate text belongs to reference language before auto-translation. Helps filter variables or non-linguistic content
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.desc: What to do when text is not in the source language
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.force: Force translation as if the text belongs to the source language
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.fill: Do not translate; fill all languages with the original text
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.switch: Manually switch to another source language for translation
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.query: Always prompt with a selection dialog, allowing the user to choose an action each time
config.unmatchedLanguageAction.ignore: Ignore the text and skip translation
config.ignorePossibleVariables.desc: Ignore extraction of strings that appear to be variables, to avoid erroneous translations
config.analysis.title: Analysis Rules
config.scanStringLiterals.desc: Scan string literals as potential keys
config.checkOnSave.desc: Check keys automatically on save (with debounce)
config.fileSizeSkipThresholdKB.desc: Skip analysis for files larger than this size (KB)
config.ignoreCommentedCode.desc: Ignore commented code and keys inside it
config.jsonParser.auto: Try JSON5 first, fallback to eval
config.sorting.writeBehavior: On fix, sort language files using the configured rule
config.ignoredUndefinedEntries.desc: Entries to ignore from undefined check
config.deeplVersion.desc: Choose DeepL version: Free (free) or Pro (pro)
config.deeplApiKey.desc: DeepL API Key (enter the key corresponding to the chosen version)
config.enableDiagnostics.desc: Enable diagnostics to underline undefined keys in code
config.completion.title: Completion
config.completionEnabled.desc: Enable i18n key completion in code editors
config.completionValueLanguage.desc: Choose which language is used for completion values
config.displayLanguageSource.source: Use source language text for completion
config.displayLanguageSource.display: Use display language text for completion
config.completionMatchScope.desc: Control which fields are matched when typing for completion
config.completionMatchScope.both: Match both translation keys and values
config.completionPinyinScope: Enable pinyin search for Chinese translation values
command.setReferredLang.title: Set as Source Language
command.setDisplayLang.title: Set as Display Language
command.markAsKnownLang.title: Mark as Known Language
command.refresh.title: Refresh
command.fix.title: Fix
command.sort.title: Sort
command.export.title: Export to Excel
command.import.title: Import from Excel
command.ignoreFile.title: Ignore File
command.copyName.title: Copy Entry Name
command.copyValue.title: Copy Entry Value
command.copyKeyValue.title: Copy Key-Value Pair
command.editValue.title: Edit Entry Value
command.deleteUnused.title: Delete Unused Entry/Entries
command.markAsUsed.title: Mark as Used
command.unmarkAsUsed.title: Unmark as Used
command.goToReference.title: Go to Reference
command.goToDefinition.title: Go to Definition
command.setProjectPath.title: Set Project Root Path
command.setLangPath.title: Set Translation File Directory
command.ignoreDirectory.title: Ignore Directory
command.ignoreLang.title: Ignore Language
command.unignoreLang.title: Unignore Language
command.toggleInlineTranslation.title: Toggle Inline Translation
command.ignore.title: Ignore
command.ignoreUndefined.title: Ignore Undefined Entry/Entries
command.openDocs.title: Open Documentation
command.openSettings.title: Open Settings
command.feedback.title: Feedback
command.fixUndefinedEntries.title: Extract Undefined Text
command.fillMissingTranslations.title: Fill Missing Translations

No translation directory detected
